name: My Vet Practice - In the Country
description: Do you sometimes dream of being a vet doctor? This dream can now come true. Build up your own practice -decide when to build which building and which patient to treat.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 / XP Processor: 1400 MHz Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB graphics card Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 2000 / XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 128 MB graphics card Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This game is cool. Kids will love it for sure xD I love it too. But it needs a button for skipping time. The time between appointments is a drag :( But once you get all sorts of animals in the pen, you get busier. So, don't worry :)
Didn't work. Couldn't even get past making a profile.
